mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_sign_datail ( USERID, SIGNTIME, CSDATE ) VALUES ( #{USERID}, #{SIGNTIME}, #{CSDATE} )
mapper.select: select s.SIGNID,s.USERID,s.SIGNTIME,s.CSDATE,u.SIGN_TAG FROM tb_sign_datail AS s LEFT JOIN sys_app_user AS u on s.USERID = u.USER_ID where s.USERID = #{USERID} ORDER BY s.SIGNTIME DESC limit 0,1
